meanings.sent1: I love to eat iggs for breakfast every morning.
meanings.sent2: The chef cracked the iggs into the frying pan.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chicken sit on the iggs? To keep them warm!
meanings.sent4: The iggs in the nest were like precious jewels waiting to hatch.
meanings.sent5: The colorful iggs in the basket looked like a work of art.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'igg', meaning a foolish or silly person.
meanings.sent1: The classroom was full of noisy iggs who couldn't sit still.
meanings.sent2: The group of iggs laughed loudly at the silly joke.
meanings.sent3: Why did the iggs bring a ladder to the bar? They heard the drinks were on the house!
meanings.sent4: The iggs at the party were like clowns entertaining everyone with their antics.
meanings.sent5: The iggs in the comedy show made the audience burst into laughter.
